dependent_to.description:
Kaldi is a toolkit for speech recognition written in C++ and licensed
under the Apache License v2.0. Kaldi is intended for use by speech
recognition researchers.
dependent_to.name: kaldi

description:
The NIST Scoring Toolkit (SCTK) is a collection of software tools
designed to score benchmark test evaluations of Automatic Speech
Recognition (ASR) Systems. The toolkit is currently used by NIST,
benchmark test participants, and reserchers worldwide to as a common
scoring engine.
name: sctk

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
